answers.answer: I'm due to get my 3rd C-section in September and I'm scared. I wouldn't dare watch a video of it being done. We just have to trust God.
Why are you guys having Csections
This will be my second one since I get preeclampsia and also can't dilate. They aren't that bad really. Just a longer healing time.
I had a previos c section and doctor recomends i have my second one the same
And i also didn't  dialatethats why my 1st one had to be a c section!

question: I am not a ftm second baby for me the first everything was so new to me with this one im aware of how things will be and crazy me watched a video of how a c section is performed and I'm just really scared I'm scheduled for one sept.7th but i cant help but think bad on my behalf im real scared.. Any positive thoughts on c sections? Cause I'm fully aware of the negative things!-_-
title: c section
